#summary a guide to setting up Transformation (ETL)

= Introduction =

This `HowTo` describes how to transform your local national data 
to INSPIRE harmonized data and how to embed this transformation in a
complete [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Extract,_transform,_load ETL (Extract, Transform, Load)] chain. This will be illustrated using
some of the existing transformation resources present within 
the project.
